text: Susan Charna Rothenberg (January 20, 1945 – May 18, 2020) was an American contemporary painter, printmaker and sculptor.ArtNews obituary She was known for her iconic images of the horse. Rothenberg’s first solo exhibition in New York in 1975. After moving to a ranch near Galisteo, New Mexico, her paintings reflected life in the Southwestern United States. Rothenberg died at her home in Galisteo on May 18, 2020, at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American painters Category:American sculptors Category:People from Buffalo, New York Category:People from New Mexico
title: Susan Rothenberg
